## ChainProCluster.createLimitOrderIntent() method

Creates an intent for a limit order in a cluster

**Signature:**

```typescript
createLimitOrderIntent(inputToken: string, outputToken: string, network: TokenNetwork, totalBuyAmount: bigint | string, maxPriceUsd: number | string | undefined, minPriceUsd: number | string | undefined, swapConfig: SwapConfig, expirySeconds?: number): Promise<PostUsersIntentsRes>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The token to sell in order to buy outputToken


</td></tr>

outputToken


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The token to buy with inputToken


</td></tr>

network


</td><td>

TokenNetwork


</td><td>

The network the tokens are on


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

totalBuyAmount


</td><td>

bigint \| string


</td><td>

The total amount of outputToken to buy, in wei/lamports


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

maxPriceUsd


</td><td>

number \| string \| undefined


</td><td>

The maximum price of the token to trigger a buy. Undefined for none


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

minPriceUsd


</td><td>

number \| string \| undefined


</td><td>

The minimum price of the token to trigger a buy. Undefined for none


</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td><td>

Configuration parameters for the swap


</td></tr>

number
